data.name: GEO Elevator Bernal
data.description: SPACE ELEVATOR - Centripedal force holds the elevator cable vertical over its anchorage.
data.rawText: Bernal SPACE ELEVATOR 10 MASS 6 Rad-Hard HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal in GEO without doubling boost costs. Time to GEO: 7.5 days Power: 4 MW (beamed) Climber Mass: 20 Mtonne

data.name: Space Elevator Lab
data.description: PLUTO-CHARON ELEVATOR - Pluto and its moon Charon are tidally locked. A tether between the two stretches 17,800 km.
data.rawText: Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.

data.name: L1 Climate Control Bernal
data.description: L1 SPACE MIRROR SWARM - A swarm of sail-mirrors in the Sol-Earth L1 Lagrange to divert sunlight for climate engineering.
data.rawText: HOME: You are always the 1st player, superseding all other claimants.

data.name: Climate Control Lab
data.description: L1 MOIRE LENS SUNSHADE - A concave rotating Fresnel lens diverts sunlight to or from a planet for climate engineering.
data.rawText: +2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.

data.name: L2 Collimator Bernal
data.description: OPTICAL TELESCOPE - Shown is one of many in a precision formation located in the Earth-Luna L2 point.
data.rawText: HOME: Gain the Powersat faction privilege.

data.name: Collimator Lab
data.description: DYSON SWARM POWERSATS - A power-beaming swarm of thousands of sun-fired lasers in inclined orbits.
data.rawText: Gain the Powersat faction privilege. Powersat push includes a Bonus Pivot.

data.name: L3 Lofstrom Loop Microgravity
data.description: LAUNCH LOOP - Accelerates humans & cargos to escape velocity.
data.rawText: HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal without doubling boost costs.

data.name: Lofstrom Loop Microgravity Lab
data.description: MASS DRIVER PROPULSION - Equipped with an electromagnetic railgun, a Bernal sacrifices its own dirt shielding for thrust.
data.rawText: Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.

data.name: L4 Antimatter Factory
data.description: LINAC Amat Factory - Cascading debris from a proton beam target are sorted to extract isotope fuels, then positrons and antiprotons.
data.rawText: HOME: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear Any reactor.

data.name: Antimatter Lab
data.description: BERNAL SPHERE - A sphere is optimal for air pressure maintenance and minimal radiation shielding.
data.rawText: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear Any reactor.

data.name: L4s Pharmaceutics Bernal
data.description: BOLO HABITAT - A dumbell geometry minimizes hull mass, although more shielding mass is needed. Mass: 17t (hull), 7t (air), Rotation: 3 rpm, Inhabitants: 15
data.rawText: HOME: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege.

data.name: Pharmaceutics Lab
data.description: PHARMING BEADED TORUS - Breeds neogenic organelles that function to reverse human disorders arising from radiation and weightlessness. Pharm Module Diameter: 100m, Inhabitants: 48
data.rawText: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege & impose academia hand limit on all opponents.

data.name: L5 Solar Cell Factory
data.description: SOLAR CELL FACTORY - Photovoltaic cells are conveyed through vapor deposition sections, then cut and integrated into panels and arrays. Length: 400m, Power: 240 MWe, Throughput: 14 ktons/yr, Inhabitants: 110
data.rawText: HOME: +1 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.

data.name: Solar Cell Lab
data.description: SUN-FIRED WPT POWER BEAM - A bio-mimetic array of solar concentrators generating microwave power. WPT Frequency: 2.45 GHz, Power: 500 MWbeam, Efficiency: 34%, Mass: 12 ktonnes
data.rawText: +2 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.

data.name: L5s Cancer Hospital
data.description: NAUTILUS-X - Parked in a Lagrange point for long duration missions. Uses a centrifuge for the investigation of microgravity on human health. Crew: 6
data.rawText: HOME: You are immune to budget cuts.

data.name: Cancer Lab
data.description: STANFORD TORUS - Primary and secondary mirrors direct sunlight into the interior. Radius: 56m (major), 7m (minor), Mass: 80t (hull), 60t (air), Rotation: 4 rpm, Inhabitants: 123
data.rawText: Gain +1 Token VP for each Colony Dome. Your Crew and Human Colonists have a rad-hard of at least 7.

data.name: SSO Diplomatic
data.description: INTERNATIONAL SPACE STATION - A habitat in LEO, launched 1998. Mass: 420 tonnes (Mass 10), Length: 51m, Inhabitants: 6
data.rawText: HOME: (Module 0) Your delegates in the Ideology of your Faction color are +1 VP each.

data.name: Diplomatic Lab
data.description: O'NEIL SUNFLOWER - Twin cylinders rotate about their center of gravity. The mirrors admit sunlight without allowing cosmic rays to bypass the shielded area. Rotation: 2 rpm, Cylinder Diameter: 1 km
data.rawText: (Module 0) Your delegates in the assembly are +1 VP each.

data.name: Tourism Cycler
data.description: 2:1 RESONANCE CYCLER - Kalpana cylinder passes monthly through the VAB as it cycles between Earth and Luna. Cylinder: 56m long, 56m dia, Unshielded Mass: 8.5 ktonnes, Hull Mass: 500 tonnes, Rotation: 4 rpm, Inhabitants: 490
data.rawText: HOME: Can designate any Spacecraft to forgo Belt Rolls in the Radiation Belts near Earth.

data.name: Tourism Hotel
data.description: MCKENDREE CYLINDER - Similar to an O'Neill Cylinder, but using carbon nanotube construction instead of steel. Cylinder: 70m long, 70m dia, Inhabitants: 700
data.rawText: +2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.
